data.title: Home Page
data.text:
Service Notices

Service Updates begin August 25.

Learn More

View the Schedules

More service, more often. We're expanding service hours systemwide!

Ride the new Route 104 Washtenaw Express! With limited stops, Route 104 is your fast, reliable connection to everything this area has to offer.

Purchase tickets anytime, anywhere using the EZ Fare app.

Personalize your riding experience! MyAlerts sends alerts straight to your inbox for the routes you care about.

TheRide offers discounted rates for senior citizens and specialty services for persons with disabilities. Get where you need to go safely and comfortably.
